title: Installation issue: mpfr
body:
<!-- Thanks for taking the time to report this build failure. To proceed with the report please:

1. Title the issue "Installation issue: <name-of-the-package>".
2. Provide the information required below.

We encourage you to try, as much as possible, to reduce your problem to the minimal example that still reproduces the issue. That would help us a lot in fixing it quickly and effectively! -->

### Steps to reproduce the issue

<!-- Fill in the exact spec you are trying to build and the relevant part of the error message -->
```console
$ spack install mpfr@4.0.2 %gcc@4.8.5
...
```

### Information on your system

<!-- Please include the output of `spack debug report` -->
* **Spack:** 0.14.2-1093-701fc1f
* **Python:** 3.6.8
* **Platform:** linux-centos7-skylake_avx512

<!-- If you have any relevant configuration detail (custom `packages.yaml` or `modules.yaml`, etc.) you can add that here as well. -->

### Additional information
==> Fetching https://www.mpfr.org/mpfr-4.0.2/allpatches
######################################################################## 100.0%
==> Error: ChecksumError: sha256 checksum failed for /tmp/cchang/spack-stage/spack-stage-6ie6x_sq/allpatches
    Expected 8f15fd27ab65341a60d724d594897d32f4597ddf642d0dc121995e2150181b0c but got 3f80b836948aa96f8d1cb9cc7f3f55973f19285482a96f9a4e1623d460bcccf0

/nopt/nrel/apps/base/2020-05-12/spack/lib/spack/spack/package.py:1151, in do_fetch:
       1148
       1149        self.stage.cache_local()
       1150
  >>   1151        for patch in self.spec.patches:
       1152            patch.fetch()
       1153            if patch.stage:
       1154                patch.stage.cache_local()


==> Error: Failed to install mpfr due to ChildError: ChecksumError: sha256 checksum failed for /tmp/cchang/spack-stage/spack-stage-6ie6x_sq/allpatches
    Expected 8f15fd27ab65341a60d724d594897d32f4597ddf642d0dc121995e2150181b0c but got 3f80b836948aa96f8d1cb9cc7f3f55973f19285482a96f9a4e1623d460bcccf0
/nopt/nrel/apps/base/2020-05-12/spack/lib/spack/spack/package.py:1151, in do_fetch:
       1148
       1149        self.stage.cache_local()
       1150
  >>   1151        for patch in self.spec.patches:
       1152            patch.fetch()
       1153            if patch.stage:
       1154                patch.stage.cache_local()

Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "/nopt/nrel/apps/base/2020-05-12/spack/lib/spack/spack/build_environment.py", line 813, in child_process
    return_value = function()
  File "/nopt/nrel/apps/base/2020-05-12/spack/lib/spack/spack/installer.py", line 1056, in build_process
    pkg.do_patch()
  File "/nopt/nrel/apps/base/2020-05-12/spack/lib/spack/spack/package.py", line 1182, in do_patch
    self.do_stage()
  File "/nopt/nrel/apps/base/2020-05-12/spack/lib/spack/spack/package.py", line 1167, in do_stage
    self.do_fetch(mirror_only)
  File "/nopt/nrel/apps/base/2020-05-12/spack/lib/spack/spack/package.py", line 1152, in do_fetch
    patch.fetch()
  File "/nopt/nrel/apps/base/2020-05-12/spack/lib/spack/spack/patch.py", line 194, in fetch
    self.stage.check()
  File "/nopt/nrel/apps/base/2020-05-12/spack/lib/spack/spack/stage.py", line 490, in check
    self.fetcher.check()
  File "/nopt/nrel/apps/base/2020-05-12/spack/lib/spack/spack/fetch_strategy.py", line 72, in wrapper
    return fun(self, *args, **kwargs)
  File "/nopt/nrel/apps/base/2020-05-12/spack/lib/spack/spack/fetch_strategy.py", line 504, in check
    "Expected %s but got %s" % (self.digest, checker.sum))
spack.fetch_strategy.ChecksumError: sha256 checksum failed for /tmp/cchang/spack-stage/spack-stage-6ie6x_sq/allpatches
    Expected 8f15fd27ab65341a60d724d594897d32f4597ddf642d0dc121995e2150181b0c but got 3f80b836948aa96f8d1cb9cc7f3f55973f19285482a96f9a4e1623d460bcccf0


<!-- Please upload the following files. They should be present in the stage directory of the failing build. Also upload any config.log or similar file if one exists. -->
N/A -- installed by skipping checksum, assume staging from prior attempt deleted.

<!-- Some packages have maintainers who have volunteered to debug build failures. Run `spack maintainers <name-of-the-package>` and @mention them here if they exist. -->

None

### General information

<!-- These boxes can be checked by replacing [ ] with [x] or by clicking them after submitting the issue. -->
- [X] I have run `spack debug report` and reported the version of Spack/Python/Platform
- [X] I have run `spack maintainers <name-of-the-package>` and @mentioned any maintainers
- [ ] I have uploaded the build log and environment files
- [X] I have searched the issues of this repo and believe this is not a duplicate
